= Introduction =
This program is optimized for Android tablet and promise to bring you the best Flickr viewing experience possible. 

= Main Features =
<ul>
<li>Browse Daily Interesting Photos</li>
<li>Browse Your Photostream</li>
<li>Browse Your Contacts' Photostream</li>
<li>View Image with Full Exif and Comments</li>
<li>View your recent activities, like comments on your photos, comments on photos you commented</li>
<li>Save a photo to your local sd card, and set it as the wallpaper</li>
<li>Share any pictures with your friends via G+, Facebook, Twitter, Gmail, Sina Weibo and many more.</li>
</ul>


Please go to android market for screenshots. [http://market.android.com/details?id=com.gmail.charleszq]
